name: sputtering, indium tin oxide, for liquid crystal display | sputtering, indium tin oxide, for liquid crystal display | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9761/documentation

This dataset is established for the manufacturing of LCD screens. Due to a lack of structured data the inventory bases on assumptions and lab-scale technology. Direct process emissions are not known and disregarded. The dataset therefore must not be used for the direct comparison of different film deposition technologies. The functional unit of this dataset is cubic meter resulting from the sputtered area times the film thickness. Film thickness depends on display technology: STN LCD: 150nm top; 330nm bottom; 480nm total. TFT LCD: 150nm top; 50nm bottom; 200nm total. Default value: 500nm total, resulting in typical values for a 17'' monitor (893.55 cm2) of 4.5E-8 m3. 85% of the target ends up as scrap.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Sputtering process and infrastructure, as well as the transportation of the targets. No pre and post treatment of the surfaces are considered.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2592:Treatment and coating of metals; machining

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Relates to RF magentron sputtering techniquewith commercially available sputtering targets. Pre-sputtering phase and subsequent main sputtering.
